Say Cheese!

Minimal javascript library for integrating a webcam and snapshots into your app.

Usage

After including the script, making use of Say Cheese! is simple :)

$(function() {
  var sayCheese = new SayCheese('#container-element');
  sayCheese.start(function() {
   // do stuff here
   this.addEventListener('saycheese:snapshot-taken')
  });
});
